sen.j: 下鴨東通（しもがもひがしどおり）は京都市左京区の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Shimogamohigashi-dori Street is one of the south and north street in Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Shimogamohigashi-dori Street is a street running south-north through Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Shimogamohigashi-dori Street is a street running south-north through Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 高野川 (京都市)の西岸を河合橋西詰から北へ馬橋まで。
sen.e: This street runs north from Kawai Bridge nishi dume at east shore of Takano River (Kyoto City) to Mabashi Bridge.
sen.cmt: 馬橋→Mabashi Bridge[正確な読みが確認できませんでした]
sen.e: The street runs north from Kawai Bridge nishi dume on the east shore of Takano River (Kyoto City) to Mabashi Bridge.
The street runs north from the west end of Kawai-bashi Bridge on the west shore of the Takano-gawa River (Kyoto City) to Uma-hashi Bridge.
sen.cmt: 河合橋西詰の表記を修正、Takano-gawa Riverとし、east shore→west shore, Mabashi Bridge→Uma-hashi Bridgeに訂正"Takano-gawa"→"the Takano-gaw"に変更しました。

sen.e: The street is in residential area.
The street is located in a residential area.
The street is located in a residential area.

Main facilities on the street
Main Facilities on the Street
sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 京都家庭裁判所 葵橋東詰
sen.e: Kyoto Family Court: Aoi Bridge higashi dume
Kyoto Family Court: Aoi Bridge higashi dume
Kyoto Family Court: the east end of Aoi-bashi Bridge

sen.cmt: 京都市立下鴨中学校→Kyoto City Shimogamo Junior High School[定訳不明]
